# Contributing to stash

Thanks for helping improve stash!

## Quick start
1. Fork and clone the repo
2. Create a virtualenv
3. Install in editable mode:
   ```bash
   pip install -e .
   ```

## Development
- Keep it dependency-free (stdlib only)
- Prefer clear CLI UX over cleverness
- Add tests for bug fixes

## PR checklist
- [ ] Update CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Run basic CLI smoke test
- [ ] Keep README examples current
